Name: Anime Wave Simulator
About the game: Anime Wave Simulator A game full of waifu well endowed by nature and particularly attached to you, it will not let you go! Progress through several difficulty modes that will give you the opportunity to access to new enemies, but also new weapons depending on the level you choose. Let's talk about weapons ! You can improve them to make your progress much easier. It's easy to get Glory Points in exchange for a victory in one of the difficulty modes. Have a blast in the new Pleasure mode in which you can take control of 3 different attractive manga-style girls and try out more than a dozen skins! The Survival mode will put your dexterity to the test ! Summary of the features of the game : The Ultimate Pleasure mode with several character models to control and several skins to wear. Sexy enemies with their own way of attacking you. Several Firearms to be unlocked A Weapon enhancement system to make weapons more powerful A Survival mode to extend your gaming experience
